# SigmaGrid API
> Institutional-grade fair value signals for synthetic equity perpetuals
> Pay-per-request via x402 micropayments (USDC on Base)

## Live Signal Endpoints (x402 gated)

> GET /v1/fair-value/{ticker}
Returns fair value estimate, confidence score, and per-venue premium/discount in basis points.
Supported tickers: SPY, QQQ, IWM, AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, META, NVDA, TSLA
Cost: 0.002 USDC per request

> GET /v1/spreads/{ticker}
Cross-venue spread analysis. Identifies cheapest/richest venue and flags arbitrage opportunities.
Cost: 0.002 USDC per request

> GET /v1/funding/{ticker}
Funding rate analysis with z-scores and anomaly detection. Includes mean-reversion probability.
Cost: 0.002 USDC per request

> GET /v1/regime
Market regime classification (risk_on, risk_off, transitioning) with VIX and confidence score.
Cost: 0.001 USDC per request

> GET /v1/events/{ticker}
Event risk flags. Upcoming earnings, historical impact, current pricing assessment.
Cost: 0.002 USDC per request

## Free Endpoints

> GET /health
API connectivity check. No payment required.

## Payment Protocol

Protocol: x402
Network: Base (Chain ID 8453)
Currency: USDC (0x833589fCD6eDb6E08f4c7C32D4f71b54bdA02913)
Flow: Request endpoint -> Receive 402 with payment details -> Pay USDC on Base -> Retry with tx proof -> Receive data

## Discovery

OpenAPI spec: /openapi.json
MCP config: /mcp.json

## Supported Assets
Indices: SPY, QQQ, IWM
MAG7: AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, META, NVDA, TSLA
Venues: Hyperliquid, Ostium, Avantis
